cont.entity_a: The wire is heavy and awkward, making it uncomfortable around the neck. The head pad and ear cups are uncomfortable and can get sweaty over extended use. The headphones have a strong clamping force that may cause discomfort over time.

cont.entity_b: Open-back design does not provide noise cancellation. The headphones are not suitable for noisy environments due to open-back design. Open-back design provides a spacious sound but lacks noise isolation.

Great value for money with excellent sound quality and comfort.
